x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: When com.glide.cs plugin is already installed, but the AI search fallback option for the OOB profile does not exist, This script creates a new system property - remove_oob_ai_search_fallback_option_after_upgrade. This new property will be used to remove a new AI search fallback option installed by the upgrade. This is for DEF0203714
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Create AISearch Fallback Option Property

sys_update_version.name: x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_fab6bb8c83e89e50c6695855eeaad3c3
sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts"><x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>true</before><description>When com.glide.cs plugin is already installed, but the AI search fallback option for the OOB profile does not exist, This script creates a new system property - remove_oob_ai_search_fallback_option_after_upgrade. This new property will be used to remove a new AI search fallback option installed by the upgrade. This is for DEF0203714</description><name>Create AISearch Fallback Option Property</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[var LOG_ID = '[Create AISearch Fallback ]]></script><sys_class_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-05 15:08:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>fab6bb8c83e89e50c6695855eeaad3c3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create AISearch Fallback Option Property</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Now Utils" source="x_938076_now_utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Now Utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_fab6bb8c83e89e50c6695855eeaad3c3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-05 15:08:12</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts></record_update>
